  • Package taskawaii.calendar

    • Class taskawaii.calendar.TaskCalendar

      class TaskCalendar extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • decrementMonth
          JButton decrementMonth
          This is the JButton for decrementing the month.
        • incrementMonth
          JButton incrementMonth
          This is the JButton for incrementing the month.
        • labelPanel
          JPanel labelPanel
          This is the JPanel for the month and year label.
        • monthYearIndicator
          JLabel monthYearIndicator
          This is the JLabel that indicates the current month and year shown in the TaskCalendar.
        • monthYearPanel
          JPanel monthYearPanel
          This is the JPanel for the Month and Year Indicator including its JButtons.
        • taskCalendarBody
          TaskCalendarBody taskCalendarBody
          This is the where the calendar itself will be placed.
        • tasks
          TaskList tasks
          This is the TaskList the TaskCalendar will be referring to.

    • Class taskawaii.calendar.TaskCalendarBody

      class TaskCalendarBody extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          This is the JPanel that will store the day of weeks JLabels.

          This is the array that stores the strings that will be printed for each day of the week.
        • table
          TaskCalendarTable table
          This is the JPanel that will be used as a placeholder for the dates.
        • tasks
          TaskList tasks
          This is the TaskList used as reference for the TaskCalendar.

    • Class taskawaii.components.CompletedTasksBar

      class CompletedTasksBar extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • actionPanel
          JPanel actionPanel
          This is the general JPanel that stores all the other action JPanels.
        • completedTasks
          TaskList completedTasks
          This is the CompletedTasksBar's own copy of the overallTaskList that stores only the complete tasks.
        • listActions
          JPanel listActions
          This is the JPanel that stores all the actions the user can do on the list.
        • listPane
          JScrollPane listPane
          This is the JScrollPanel that will store the listPanel to make it scrollable.
        • listPanel
          JPanel listPanel
          This is the JPanel that stores the listItems.
        • markTaskButton
          JButton markTaskButton
          This is the JButton to mark tasks as incomplete.
        • overallTaskList
          TaskList overallTaskList
          This is the reference of the CompletedTasksBar for the user TaskList.
        • removeTaskButton
          JButton removeTaskButton
          This is the JButton to remove tasks.
        • selectedTask
          Task selectedTask
          This is the current task selected by the user. Its value can be null.
        • sortActions
          JPanel sortActions
          This is the JPanel that stores all the actions the user can do to sort the list.
        • sortByAddition
          JButton sortByAddition
          This is the JButton to sort by addition.
        • sortByEndDate
          JButton sortByEndDate
          This is the JButton to sort by endDate.
        • sortByName
          JButton sortByName
          This is the JButton to sort by name.
        • sortByPriority
          JButton sortByPriority
          This is the JButton to sort by priority.
        • sortMode
          int sortMode
          This is the sort mode the CompletedTasksBar is currently in.

          (0 - addition, 1 - endDate, 2 - priority, 3 - name)

      • Serialized Fields

        • calendarButton
          JButton calendarButton
          This is the JButton for opening the TaskCalendar frame.
        • calendarFrame

          This is where the TaskCalendar frame will be stored if the calendarButton is pressed.
        • centerPanel
          JPanel centerPanel
          This is the centerPanel in the HomePage based from BorderLayout.
        • changeName
          JMenuItem changeName
          This is one of the JMenuItems for the userMenu. It will prompt the user for the new name for its user profile.
        • eastPanel
          JPanel eastPanel
          This is the eastPanel in the HomePage based from BorderLayout.
        • menuBar
          JMenuBar menuBar
          This is the JMenuBar of the HomePage.
        • northPanel
          JPanel northPanel
          This is the northPanel in the HomePage based on the BorderLayout.
        • southPanel
          JPanel southPanel
          This is the southPanel in the HomePage based from BorderLayout.
        • TASKawaiiIcon
          ImageIcon TASKawaiiIcon
          This is the ImageIcon for the TASKawaii logo.
        • user
          User user
          This is where the user will be stored.
        • userMenu
          JMenu userMenu
          This is one of the JMenus available in the menuBar. It mainly deals with actions that concern the user specifically.
        • userName
          JLabel userName
          This is the JLabel for displaying the user name.
        • westPanel
          JPanel westPanel
          This is the westPanel in the HomePage based from BorderLayout.

          This is the variable to hold the font of the task.
